app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p:
The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/2073-4360/11/6/1081/s1, Figure S1: Correlation function
S
A A
( q )
for A block plotted against the scattering vector q for incompressible AB diblock copolymer melt at
ϕ A
= 0.4
and at
N χ
= 14, whose morphology is evolved from Equation (11). Figure S2: Local compositions profiles for the same copolymer exhibiting the lamellar morphology.
